pageContext.claim: “The Failing and Corrupt @nytimes estimated the crowd last night at “1000 people,” when in fact it was many times that number - and the arena was rockin’. This is the way they demean and disparage. They are very dishonest people who don’t “get” me, and never did!”
pageContext.analysis: The New York Times updated their estimate to the Fire Marshall's count of 5,500. According to the Tennessean, the Trump campaign still claimed there were 8,000 people at the rally, which is just shy of the stadium's maximum capacity.
